carbon.internal

Class AllCapsTransformationMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • carbon.internal.AllCapsTransformationMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.method.TransformationMethod

    public class AllCapsTransformationMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.method.TransformationMethod
    Transformation method used for making all characters capitalized. Can be used by all classes derived from TextView.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AllCapsTransformationMethod(android.content.Context context)
      Uses current locale.
